participant_1.name: Emma Thompson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and hardworking with a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: I've never been arrested, but I did meet one of my favorite celebrities and get his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire. I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family. I am a fruitarian. Sometimes I wish my computer would work faster. I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed.

participant_2.name: Oliver Svensson
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and laid-back, devoted to animal welfare.
participant_2.background: I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals. My cape is in storage and I am trying to adjust to Swedish life. My favorite author is Jane Austen. I love my parents very much. I am a couch potato.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing this fine day?
I am doing very well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am just relaxing on my couch, watching some TV.
I am watching a Jane Austen adaptation.
Oh, that sounds good! I love Jane Austen.
Me too! She is one of my favorite authors.
What is your favorite book of hers?
I have a few favorites, but I think my favorite is "Pride and Prejudice."
That is a great book! I love it too.
I am glad to hear that!
What do you like most about the book?
I love the characters and the humor.
Yes, the characters are great! And the humor is very well-done.
I agree! I am glad to meet someone else who loves Jane Austen.
Me too! It is always nice to find a fellow Austen fan.
